Code and Data

Code

  • Walkthrough.ipynb | A walkthrough of the analysis we did on microtubule catastrophe times. To run, download both datasets and put them into a directory, data/, in the same directory as this file. Also, install the microtubule_analysis package.

  • microtubule_analysis_package.zip | A zip containing the package used for microtubule analysis. to install, extract and run pip install -e microtubule_analysis.

Data Sets

  • Catastrophe times for labeled and unlabeled microtubules | (filetype: .csv)(4.5 kB)

  • Catastrophe times for various tublin concentrations | (filetype: .csv)(11 kB)
